description: A manager of the Nankatsu middle school football team, during the middle school arc of the Captain Tsubasa series, Kumi true interest is not in football but in http://anidb.net/ch2083 [Oozora Tsubasa] for whom she has a crush on. While a true rival of http://anidb.net/ch30218 [Nakazawa Sanae], Tsubasa already has someone he likes.
name: Sugimoto Kumi
